docs.title: Install
docs.text:
Create a virtual environment with python 3.12:

conda create -n env_challenge python=3.12
conda activate env_challenge

Install the project

pip install poetry
poetry install --with dev

docs.title: Download dataset
docs.text:
The dataset is very large. For the first experiments, we recommend using the mini dataset.

  • mini dataset: see in the Data section in Kaggle
  • whole dataset: TO BE COMPLETED on Kaggle

docs.text: We provide a welcoming notebook to visualize and load the data: demo.ipynb.
